Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.Gui
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Gui extends ViewObservable implements View
This class offers a Graphical User Interface. It is an implementation of the View interface.

    • askPlaySettings

      public void askPlaySettings()
